name: hyperapp
description: JavaScript micro-framework for building web interfaces.
author: Jorge Bucaran

scripts.build: export dir=${pkg:+lib/$pkg/} pkg=$npm_package_name$pkg; npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.create: npm run build && git commit -am $msg && git tag -s $msg -m $msg && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release: env msg=$(npm run -s message) npm run create && cd ./${pkg:+lib/$pkg} && npm publish --access public
